title: ● Is it a person who is not a holy person to eat from a person?
subtitle: The evidence-free Internet diary says that the tile, one of the most consumed freshwater fish in the United States, is "killing our families."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Telavia is a boneless fish, skinless, "sky" full of cancer-causing dioxins, worse than bacon or hamburgers, and it kills our families.
